sense.def:
Publicity
so oglasi, podatki ali dejanja, s katerimi želimo pritegniti pozornost javnosti na nekoga ali nekaj.

seg.quote: There was some advance publicity for the book.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
receives publicity
, tistemu časopisi in televizija posvečajo veliko pozornosti.

seg.quote: Feminism has attracted a lot of publicity.
